# GridItem.Size.fixed(_:)

**Case**

A single item with the specified fixed size.

## Declaration

```swift
case fixed(CGFloat)
```

## Getting the sizes

- **GridItem.Size.adaptive(minimum:maximum:)**: Multiple items in the space of a single flexible item.
- **GridItem.Size.flexible(minimum:maximum:)**: A single flexible item.

items.description: Multiple items in the space of a single flexible item.
items.name: GridItem.Size.adaptive(minimum:maximum:)
